DOC.brief_summary: To assess implant outcome , clinical radiological , randomize study guide implant placement 3-year follow-up , compare non-guided treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Dental Implants Placed Using Drill Guide Versus Non-guided Placement . Follow-up Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . An age least 18 year 3 . Extraction socket heal least 6 month 1 . Unlikely able comply study procedures 2 . History intravenous bisphosphonate treatment 3 . Medical history make implant insertion unfavorable 4 . Current pregnancy 5 . Present alcohol and/or drug abuse 6 . Major systemic disease 7 . Untreated , uncontrolled caries and/or periodontal disease 8 . History local irradiation 9 . Need bone graft and/or sinus lift plan implant area
